t: Amazon introduces Hippo Harvest’s first leafy greens line, grown with 92% less water
s: Less than two years after investing in climate-tech startup Hippo Harvest, Amazon is selling the company’s first line of leafy green lettuces. The greens are grown using 92% less water and 55% less fertilizer than conventional produce, according to Hippo Harvest.

t: Explained: What is keyword harvesting on Amazon?
s: March 3, 2025 - When you harvest new search terms, make sure you are applying separate criteria to the branded terms as to the non-branded terms. t: Warning: Your Amazon Ads Are Wasting Budget Without Proper Keyword Harvesting
s: October 9, 2024 - Welcome to our Amazon Audit series, where we highlight mistakes brands don’t even realize they’re making. One major miss we often spot? Brands overlooking keyword harvesting.
